{{Description|[[Collei]] heads to [[Sumeru]] with [[Cyno]], leaving behind a letter for [[Amber]]. [[Diluc]] escapes from the [[Fatui]]'s clutches, and [[Kaeya]] pays him a visit at [[Angel's Share]] to give a replacement vase... and return the [[Vision]] he left behind with the Ordo Favonius.<!--not official-->}}
'''Talks Over a Drink''' ''(unofficial name)'' is Chapter 16 of the ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' [[manga]]. It has not yet been localized in English.

==Trivia==
